text: Al-Farouq Aminu (@farouq1) has been hot recently, scoring double-digit pts in five consecutive games on 53% shooting (41% on the season). Aminu figures to be key as the @TrailBlazers (44-28) take on the @OKCThunder (44-30) tonight at 7pm ET https://t.co/cRgB1LQwO6
